group_1.narration: Just like it sounds, it's a Labyrinth@made of countless Mirror Layers...
I got an invitation, and when I arrived@Familiars came and pulled me in.@Then they...made a "mold" of me...
But when I went back like Mitama@told me to... It was just so crazy!
Kaede split off from the group, and@Rena turned out to be a copy...
Yachiyo helped us out of a bind and@Ria, well, she...kinda helped, too.@Then, finally, Momoko showed up...
Basically, it was really tough. I never@would've been able to manage it alone!

group_1.textCenter: Here I am again...

group_1.narration: Back in the Mirror Witch's Mansion...

group_1.textCenter: You'll lose sight of yourself if you@spend too long looking into the mirror...

group_1.narration: Those words of Mitama's@made me really curious...
So, several days after my last visit,@I came back here...
But I brought her along this time...

group_1.textCenter: No letting your guard down, okay Iroha?!
Don't worry, I'll be here to support you@as your Magical Girl senpai!
Leave it all to me! Yep, yep!

group_1.narration: Tsuruno offered to accompany me this time.

group_1.textCenter: (Well, here I am...)
(But it looks like Mitama isn't here today...)
(Well, I know the way in, so it should be@okay...)

group_1.textRight: Wait a minute!

group_1.textCenter: Waaah![chara:100100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
Tsu...Tsuruno...?

group_1.textRight: Yep yep!
Iroha, you were gonna head into the@Endless Mirrors, weren't you?
[chara:100300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Then I will, too! Let's go in together!

group_1.narration: So, basically Tsuruno just happened to be@there at the same time, and joined me.

group_1.textRight: I come here a lot to train!
I can fight against myself here. I make@a pretty great sparring partner!
*Giggle*[chara:100300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]

group_1.textCenter: (Well, I tried to make this look like@a chance meeting, but actually...)
(There's another side to the story!)

group_1.textLeft: Endless Mirrors? Yeah, I still go there!

group_1.textRight: In that case, I have a favor to ask.
If you see Iroha in the Mirror Witch's@Mansion...

group_1.textCenter: "Please go with her, as it could be@dangerous for her to go alone!"
Well I can't blame her for worrying...
Even I struggle in this place sometimes.
Yachiyo has a real knack for sensing@what's going down...
She said, "Iroha might show up@sometime soon..."
I'm no slouch either! Did you see my@acting back there? SUPER natural!
Spiritually transcendent, even! The gods@of acting descended to bless me!
Who'd have thought my acting skills were@the Mightiest, too? How far can I go?!

group_1.textRight: Hwuh?![chara:100300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textLeft: You've kinda been talking to yourself...

group_1.textRight: Wh-ah-um, r-r-REALLY?! What did ya@hear...?
Oh, yeah! Yeah, right! You have to@strengthen your spiritual focus!
Yes! Concentrate real hard! Like this!@HMMMNGH...!
Y-yeah! Do that, and, uh, you...uh, might@hear a mysterious voice speaking to you!
So, listen! Listen hard!
Listen hard, and...

group_1.textCenter: NAAAHAHAHAHA!

group_1.textRight: There! I definitely heard a voice...
Huh?[chara:100300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textLeft: You're right... I hear it, too!

group_1.textRight: I wasn't expecting that...
Well! [chara:100300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100300:cheek_0][chara:100300:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100300:lipSynch_1]That's easy, it means, uh...
Wait a sec! [chara:100300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100300:cheek_0][chara:100300:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100300:lipSynch_1]I know that voice...

group_1.textLeft: Uwaaagh! Like, what a thrill that was!@Never had such a scare! Totes awesome!

group_1.textRight: Emily-sensei!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, is that Tsurupi? Whoa! It's been@FOREVER! How are ya?

group_1.textRight: Sensei! [chara:100300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Long time no see!

group_1.textLeft: Is she one of your...friends, Tsuruno?

group_1.textRight: Please, she's too amazing to be@just a friend!
She guides the lost to the@answers they need! She rocks!

group_1.textLeft: Who, me? Oh, please, no! I'm nothing@special!

group_1.textCenter: We're totally friends!

group_1.textRight: Like, didn't I say before? For real don't@call me "sensei" or whatever.
...[chara:100300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100300:lipSynch_1]What the...?!
This place is packed full of copies of@Emily-sensei!!!
